Job Description: Key Skills:       We\'re looking for people who are smart and can make things happen.     -Solid experience in C# or VC .    -Solid expertise in Data Structures and Algorithms.    -Solid understanding of Object Oriented design and concepts.    -Great understanding of database theory and solid experience in at least one relational DBMS.    -Outstanding interpersonal and communication skills.    -Obsession with quality and customer experience - Attention to detail coupled with ability to think abstractly.     -Experience with scaling and performance of large systems
